author: jKrakow
title: A weekend in Paradise
text:
Using some portals to book our stay at Montcalm, I was not expecting a such royal treatment. A personal service starting already a few days before, to the arrival up to our checkout. An upgrade to a better room. A perfect service. A mobile phone in the room that can be taken in the city. A great breakfast buffet. A choice of pillow and odors... I was looking for a weekend with a touch of luxury and you made it unforgettable!
Iza from guest services has really made our stay from great to gorgeous!
I dont need to look anymore where I will stay next time I am going to London.
